title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Major General (Rtd) Sohail Ahmad Khan

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Major General (Rtd) Sohail Ahmad Khan, High Commissioner of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan to Nigeria today, 22nd May, 2024.
Discussed bilateral issues, including enhancing collaboration in the areas of
science and technology, combating drug trafficking, oil and gas, economy, trade and investment, education, defence, youth development, and Bilateral Air Services Agreement (BASA) amongst others.
